title: Sim not detected
content:
I am using a physical sim from another carrier along with google fi esim on my pixel. 

It was working fine for months but suddenly stopped detecting the physical sim a few days ago. 

The sim is still active with call and data services, and still gets detected on another android device. 

Please help with the issue.
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 3a XL
